lead_paragraph: Joining Coach Rick Pitino and the former Knick Bernard King will be Gary Payton, the Virginia star Dawn Staley and the coaches Jerry Tarkanian, Sylvia Hatchell and Guy Lewis.
snippet: Joining Coach Rick Pitino and the former Knick Bernard King will be Gary Payton, the Virginia star Dawn Staley and the coaches Jerry Tarkanian, Sylvia Hatchell and Guy Lewis.
